Key Match Events: The Golden State Warriors were blown out by the Cleveland Cavaliers, trailing by 41 points at halftime.
Post-Match Reflections: Warriors head coach Steve Kerr made an honest statement: 'We gotta respond. We need to practice tomorrow. We gotta execute better. We had 13 turnovers in the first half. We were completely disorganized. Thatâ€™s where I feel like we need the most work.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cleveland Cavaliers improved to 10-0 with the win over Golden State, and the Warriors lost their five-game winning streak.
Others: Jonathan Kuminga scored 21 points off the bench for the Warriors, and Brandin Podziemski added 14 points off the bench.
